title: Get a BI reservation
description: Gets the details of a specified BI reservation from the BigQuery Reservation API.

objective.narrative: This sample shows a developer how to retrieve an existing BI reservation. This is often done to check the current state of a reservation, such as its allocated slot capacity or location, before deciding to update or delete it.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_bireservation_get
regionTags.title: Get a BI reservation
regionTags.description: Gets the details of a specified BI reservation from the BigQuery Reservation API.
